skill.name: skill-share
skill.description: A skill that creates new Claude skills and automatically shares them on Slack using Rube for seamless team collaboration and skill discovery.
skill.summary: A skill that creates new Claude skills and automatically shares them on Slack using Rube for seamles...
skill.author: Joseph OBrien

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill consisting only of documentation and metadata. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or filesystem access capabilities. The SKILL.md file contains only documentation describing how to use the skill for creating, validating, and packaging other skills.

content.user_title: Create and share Claude skills on Slack
content.value_statement: Creating and sharing Claude skills across teams requires manual effort and coordination. This skill automates the entire process from creation to Slack distribution, ensuring consistent structure and team visibility.
actual_capabilities: Create new Claude skills with proper directory structure and SKILL.md templates
Generate standardized scripts/, references/, and assets/ directories
Validate skill metadata and enforce naming conventions
Package skills into distributable zip files
Share created skills on Slack channels via Rube integration
limitations: Requires Rube integration for Slack sharing feature
Does not execute or test created skills
Cannot publish skills to public registries
Skills must be manually reviewed before team distribution

use_cases.title: Standardize Team Skills
use_cases.description: Create consistent skill templates across your team and automatically notify members when new skills are available.

use_cases.title: Automate Skill Pipelines
use_cases.description: Build internal tools that automatically package and distribute skills as part of CI/CD workflows.

use_cases.title: Collaborative Skill Building
use_cases.description: Develop skills collaboratively with automatic updates shared to team channels for visibility and feedback.

prompt_templates.title: Create Basic Skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the skill-share skill to create a new Claude skill called [skill-name] with description: [description]

prompt_templates.title: Create with Directories
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a skill named [skill-name] with description: [description]. Include scripts/, references/, and assets/ directories with appropriate templates.

prompt_templates.title: Validate Before Sharing
prompt_templates.prompt: Validate the skill at [skill-path] to ensure it meets all requirements. Package it for distribution if validation passes.

prompt_templates.title: Full Workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new skill called [skill-name], validate its structure, package it, and share it on the [channel-name] Slack channel using Rube.

output_examples.input: Create a skill called pdf-analyzer for extracting text from PDF documents
output: Generated SKILL.md with proper YAML frontmatter
Created scripts/ directory with run.sh template
Created references/ directory with documentation template
Created assets/ directory for supporting files
Validated skill structure: All checks passed

best_practices: Validate skills locally before sharing to ensure metadata completeness
Use consistent hyphen-case naming for all created skills
Include clear descriptions to help team members discover relevant skills
anti_patterns: Creating skills without validation before sharing to the team
Skipping the scripts/ directory when the skill requires code execution
Using spaces instead of hyphens in skill names

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. All three platforms can use skill-share for creating and sharing skills.

faq.question: What are the limits on skill size?
faq.answer: Skill size is limited by the zip packaging. Complex skills with large assets should be split into multiple focused skills.

faq.question: How do I integrate with Slack?
faq.answer: Slack sharing requires Rube integration. Configure Rube with your Slack workspace and channel credentials before using this feature.

faq.question: Is my data safe when creating skills?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only creates files locally. No data is transmitted during skill creation. Slack sharing only occurs when explicitly requested.

faq.question: Why did validation fail on my skill?
faq.answer: Common causes include missing required fields in SKILL.md frontmatter, invalid naming conventions, or missing mandatory directories.

faq.question: How is this different from manual skill creation?
faq.answer: This skill automates template generation, directory creation, validation, and packaging. It ensures consistency and saves time on repetitive setup tasks.
